item.title: How to Install Hugo
item.description: HowTO install HUGO Must have brew git Installing HUGO You will need first to have brew installed on your device so make sure that is up and running. Then from linux/mac just open the terminal and install HUGO. brew install hugo If everything was fine just check it with: hugo version Now a days is common to have git preinstalled by default. Anyway, if you need to check if the package is already there there then:
